trigger.name: Fortinet {HOSTNAME} - Memory Usage Over 90%
trigger.description: Memory usage on Fortinet is more than 90% during the last five checks

trigger.name: Fortinet {HOST.NAME} Rebooted
trigger.description: The Fortinet has been rebooted during last 10 checks

trigger.name: No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

trigger_prototype.name: {#DEVNAME}: Unregistered via FortiManager
trigger_prototype.description: A Device is reporting as unauthorized on FortiManager/Analyzer. Please report verify the device and authorize it in FortiManager/Analyzer.

trigger_prototype.name: {#DEVNAME}: Device State Failure via FortiManager | Error Code:{#DEVSTATE}
